attributes.action: report fully on the arrest of MP Damian Green
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We feel the arrest of MP Damian Green is a threat to the whole foundation of democracy in the UK. We seek an end to the growth of police powers and use of existing legislation to suppress citizens' search and use of information deemed to be in the public interest.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
